articles.author: Natalie Neysa Alund and Thao Nguyen, USA TODAY
articles.title: Kidnapped Americans crossed the border to buy medicine: López Obrador - USA TODAY
articles.description: Meanwhile, the FBI is offering a $50K reward for the return of the Americans and the arrest of those involved in Mexico.
articles.content:
Four American citizens were assaulted and kidnapped by unidentified gunmen after crossing into Mexico last week to buy medicine, Mexican officials said Monday.
